issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: We see issues with RM trying to launch a container while a NM is restarting and we get exceptions like NMNotReadyException. While YARN-3842 added retry for other clients of NM (AMs mainly) its not used by AMLauncher in RM causing there intermittent errors to cause job failures. This can manifest during rolling restart of NMs.
fields.summary: AMLauncher does not retry on failures when talking to NM

comments.body: Propose using retries in the ContainerManagement proxy used by the AMLauncher#getContainerMgrProxy
reuse the same retry proxy used by AM client for RM client. Also opened YARN-4185 to improve this retry mechanism
